resources.string: Enter Tasks and check them as you complete them. Press reset to clear.

Email: thatstraveling@gmail.com
 Phone: (765) 376-6225
 Discord: Tepes#5035
 Website: https://naomikeller.github.io

This program's intent is to provide a place for individuals to keep track of their daily tasks and check them off as they complete them. 

 You can use the text box at the top of the main application to enter tasks and they will fill out the list. Once you have completed a task, you may click on the task in the list to check it as complete. Once every task for that day is complete, or you wish to delete all tasks in the list, use the Reset button at the top of the screen. 

 Additional settings may be found in the settings menu, which you can access using the settings button, also at the top of the screen.
